Package NimMainFiles

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    The interface Player allows the classes that implement it to make moves polymorphically and to get their respective names.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HumanPlayer
    A human player can select how many marbles they want to remove from the pile.
    Nim
    A class that simulates a Nim game.
    Pile
    Manages the pile of marbles to be used throughout the game of Nim.
    SmartComputer
    The smart computer will use an algorithm to win at all times.
    StupidComputer
    The stupid computer will remove a random number of marbles from the pile.
